Крайне дисбалансная игра. Вероятно, самая дисбалансная из всех игр. Играть за выжившего практически невозможно. Собственно их давно пора переименовать в погибших. Играть за убийцу не представляет вообще никакой сложности. Одно рукой играешь, другой держишь книгу параллельно почитывая. Криворукие разработчики ничего не делают с этим. Большинство способностей «выживших» абсолютно бесполезны и сделаны, видимо, просто для галочки. Способности же убийц, которыми и так очень легко играть, делают их ещё сильнее, а игру проще. Как результат играть за убийцу неинтересно из-за простоты, играть за «выжившего» неинтересно, потому что вероятность выживания практически равна 0.

qte模拟器。逛街即去世。玩了80小时后手学会了自动打qte，离打出完美qte大概还差200小时。
下版本削无敌房，可能要成为单边玩家，请神仙们指导指导失聪0妹。
开玩笑的，本人最爱逛街＋白嫖。游戏嘛自己开心就好打屠夫不爽就带红苹果打人类带手电筒玩不好就拔线。
总结：除了国服移动网登录随缘，每次更新增加新的bug，不开加速器容易飙黄/红ping，玩家普遍ggez，容错率极低，以及zzz是智障组的缩写以外，都挺好的。
对了，还得提一嘴，宣传仅供参考，一切以实物为准。建模简直丑的不忍直视（指凤敏兔耳

This game is poopy ass dicks. The community is toxic, and are all dickheads. Being in the community for months, I know this all about them: they gloat, they are selfish assholes who don't care about what others feel, they ban you for opinion in their Discords, and they are all just terrible people in the community that is Dead By Daylight. The game has terrible mechanics, too many glitches, and everything about it is just fuckin terrible. If I could, I would refund this game and everything I had terribly purchased with it. The purchases are not worth it, I tell you this right now. I personally want this game banned or taken down from consoles and Steam as a whole. It doesn't deserve it's place in the gaming community. 

I warn you: DO NOT BUY THIS GAME. Don't waste 20 dollars or more on this. Go and purchase GMOD or PUBG, I don't care, just don't purchase this godawful no good sack of shit game. Do not join the community either, its terrible as well. Thanks for reading and I hope you take this review to heart.

Um jogo que me divertiu muito quando comecei a jogar, mas com o passar do tempo foi se tornando estressante por conta dos diversos bugs que o jogo tem e o constante descaso da empresa do jogo em resolve-los. Muitos desses bugs ja existem a anos e mesmo assim a empresa não se posiciona sobre o assunto.

A comunidade do jogo é péssima e o game é extremamente desbalanceado para sobrevivente, fazendo com que os killers tenham que ficar apelando para táticas ridículas e irritantes para poderem fazer algo na partida.

O rank desse jogo é frustante e muito mau trabalhado, pois você como sobrevivente precisa fazer tudo ao mesmo tempo para conseguir pontuar para subir de rank e mesmo assim as vezes mesmo conseguindo fazer gerador, resgatar alguém do gancho e fugir do killer você sai prejudicado pois a partida foi rápida aos olhos da empresa, ou seja, os sobrevivente e o killer tem que ficar enrolando dentro da partida para conseguir pontos.

Adicionaram um sistema de punição para quem abandonar o jogo, mas não resolveram os problemas de queda da partida e isso ta fazendo pessoas sofrerem punição por culpa da empresa, fazendo o jogo ficar cada vez mais vazio dia após dia.

Existem muitos problemas e não tem como mencionar todos nesse texto, mas eu não recomendo esse jogo a não ser que queira passar raiva com uma empresa que só se importa em lucrar com DLC ao invés de mudar coisas básicas no jogo para melhorar a gameplay.

(본인은 364시간을 플레이했고, 살인마유저이며 생존자도 많이 한다.)
(평가는 주관적으로 하므로 다른사람의 평가도 보는것을 추천한다.)

이게임은 처음에 사보면 생존자 입장에서 꽤나 무섭고 재미있고 어렵다고 느낄것이다. 
하지만 계속하다 보면 생존자에게 매우 유리한 게임인것을 알것이고 팀운이 매우 많이 따르는 갓겜이라는 것을 알게 될것이다. 

그리고 살인마 입장에서 이게임은 랭크가 낮을떄는 쉽게 생존자를 잡으면서 광기에 물들 수 있겠지만, 
계속하다 보면 점점 생존자도 잡기 어려워지고 더러운 비매너 플레이를 하는 유저를 많이 보게 될것이다.

생존자에게 치우쳐지는 벨런스 붕괴, 온갖 버그와 티배깅을 보면서 즐거워 하는 변태가 있다면 강추한다.

하지만 게임은 재미있기는 하다. 본인도 매일 버그망겜, 생존마 망겜이라고 외치며 계속 플레이하고 있다.ㅠㅠ

예외의 경우지만 만약 자신이 이게임을 같이 할 친구가 있다면 재미있게 즐길 수 있다. 만약 친구들끼리 생존자와 
살인마를 번갈아가면서 한다면 강추해주고 싶다.(본인은 친없찐....)

결과적으로 이게임은 추천하지 않는다. 만약 이 게임을 하고 싶다면 데바데 방송을 보며 대리만족하는 것이 정신건강에 이롭다는것을 알아뒀으면 한다.

I never leave reviews for games unless I feel strongly about it. This is the most unbalanced game I have played in a long time.  Here is my list why:

- The biggest issue with this game is that the goal of a survivor isnt actually to escape from the killer.  It is instead to farm as many blood points (used to unlock new perks) as possible.  It can actually be detrimental to your character progression if you escape too quickly as you are not able to farm enough blood points.

- I acknowledge that I am not incredibly experienced in the art of escaping the killer. However, everything seems to be working against the survivors.  Every killer is faster than every survivor. You will never outrun them. Your only hope is to try and confuse them by running behind parts of the environment (but there are tracks that you leave behind when you are running).  The 1 tool you have to slow the killer down is a pallet that you can throw down in front of them to stun them for a second or two. Even landing this successfully and sprinting immediately will not put enough distance between you and the killer. They will close the gap after they recover. Once you are found, the only thing you can do is stall the killer for as long as possible so your team can try to accomplish their tasks. The odds are that you will be wounded.

- There are multiples characters to choose from, each with unique perks.  The majority of perks in this game are useless.  The few perks that are useful are so minimally helpful that it seems pointless to rely on them.  For instance, their is an ability that gives you a speed boost after being hit. Sounds great. Too bad that the speed boost is so brief that it doesnt even let you move far enough away to break the sight line with the killer.

I assume that after 100 hours of gameplay you can eventually learn how to be a perfect survivor. I am sure that there are those who are quite good at it. Ive played at least 20 games and never once escaped unless the killer let us (because they only wanted to farm blood points). The odds are incredibly stacked against the survivors and its truly not enjoyable feeling as though there is absolutely nothing you can do to avoid the killer once they spot you. You basically have to accept the fact that you will lose every game until you farm enough blood points to max out a character and can finally try to use all available tools to survive. For those wanting to avoid a headache, take a hard pass on this game.

Most of the time you will feel as though the odds are against you. For some this will be frustrating. For others, this will create a sense of thrill. The rewards feel so great once you escape because it feels like you've overcome an impossible situation. I really enjoy this game and it is a reliable fall-back when i have nothing else to play.

It's great until I get camped by a killer who runs no-ed and my teammates are hiding in lockers waiting for me to die. 10/10, You really can't get any other mental abuse like this other than a toxic relationship.

Wowie I've put in 1k hours without even realizing it. Amazing game with a diligent release schedule. I'm not the biggest fan of the Battle Pass system they added but it is totally optional. Have had issues here and there, but they have been resolved.

EDIT: Can't delay the release of the worst, buggiest update of all time, but makes an entire segment of their game base (Switch users) unable to play with others during one of the best Blood Hunts of the Year. BE is a company without morals and only cares about your money. Don't give them more.
